txt.en:
'A festival is always a great time for a drink. Oh! That reminds me, I have a request of you.

'I brewed up a special batch of my annual festival ale recently, but I'm down to only a few pints left. Would you take this pint of ale to my friend Roger Hazeltwig in Bree? He usually stops by for a taste, but he hasn't been able to visit in quite some time.

'Give him my regards... and a merry festival to you both!'
'Greetings.\n\n'Ah, I see what you have there. With a colour and aroma like that, this can only have come from my friend Runulf! You have my deepest thanks for bringing this to me.'
'If you're looking for Roger, you can find him in the town of Bree, by the famous Boar-fountain. Give him my regards when you see him.'
Runulf wishes to spread the cheer of the celebration to his friend, Roger Hazeltwig.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
You have delivered the festival ale
Deliver the festival ale to Roger Hazeltwig near the Boar-fountain in Bree
Roger Hazeltwig is near the Boar-fountain in Bree.\n\nRunulf has requested that you take a pint of his special brew of ale to Roger Hazeltwig.
Deliver the festival ale to Roger Hazeltwig near the fountain in Bree
